name: (re)birthday
description:
Destroy your old self
Forge a new identity
All in three minutes

https://www.glaad.org/transgender/transfaq

--

This game was created for Meditations, a launcher that provides a unique game every day of the year in 2018. This game appeared as the meditation of the day on February 3rd, and is now immortalized here. 

I would highly recommend downloading the Meditations launcher and checking out all of the other amazing games this project has to offer!
